body: keith randall suggested that since convT2I now has an itab argument, we don't need the src type argument anymore (that's already in the itab). Removing that argument saves another 0.1% space in the binaries I tried - the savings are now ~1.3% for bin/{gen,go,gofmt} binaries and ~1.1% for the pkg/tool/linux_amd64/* binaries.
